title: ‘Normally I Give Up After a Bad Day’: No Stage Wins, Tom Pidcock Redefining Success during Giro d’Italia
content:
No Giro stage win so far, but a top-10 is within reach for Pidcock, and maybe a bigger grand tour future: 'GC is harder than anything else I’ve done.'

Read the full article at ‘Normally I Give Up After a Bad Day’: No Stage Wins, Tom Pidcock Redefining Success during Giro d’Italia on Velo.
